The Boy and the Goddess
Tell me about a complicated man. Muse, tell me how he wandered and was lost when he had wrecked the holy town of Troy, where he went, and who he met, the pain suffered on the sea, and how he worked to save his life and bring his men back home. He failed, and for their own mistakes, they died. They are the Sun God's cattle, and the god kept them from home. Now goddess, child of Zeus, tell the old story for our modern times. Find the beginning.
